DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study High-Dose Cyclophosphamide Total Body Irradiation With T Lymphocyte-Depleted Autologous Peripheral Blood Stem Cell Bone Marrow Rescue Patients With Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Following induction course cyclophosphamide IV , patient receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously ( SC ) daily completion peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) harvesting . PBSCs collect several day . Patients mobilize sufficient cell undergo bone marrow harvest . Harvested PBSCs bone marrow undergo T-lymphocyte depletion . Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day -6 -5 methylprednisolone IV daily day -4 -1 . Patients also undergo total body irradiation twice day day -4 -1 . Lymphocyte-depleted PBSCs bone marrow reinfused day 0 . Patients receive G-CSF SC daily begin day 0 continue blood count recover 3 day . Patients follow 1 , 2 , 3 , 6 , 12 month annually 5 year .
